description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure communications management and monitoring equipment, Radio Base Station Kits. The RFP requires bidders to use Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect service. Supply Arrangement #W6399-21CA06 holders (only) have been emailed Request for Proposal W6399-23DB18 Radio Base Station Kits. Other interested bidders may submit bids to qualify for the Supply Arrangement #W6399-21CA06 first. Once qualified for the Supply Arrangement #W6399-21CA06, bidders will be able to access W6399-23DB18 Radio Base Station Kits Request for Proposal.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Request for Proposal: Radio Base Station Kits**

**Notice Number:** W6399-23DB18/A

**Closing Date:** 2023-01-13T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of Radio Base Station Kits. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open to Canadian vendors who are registered with Canada Post Corporation's (CPC) Connect service.

**Supply Arrangement:** Suppliers who are already registered in the Supply Arrangement #W6399-21CA06 will be emailed the RFP and may submit proposals directly. Other interested bidders must first qualify for the Supply Arrangement #W6399-21CA06 before accessing the RFP.

**Requirements:**

* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
* Delivery Date: All deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023

**Submission Instructions:**

* Proposals must be submitted via CPC Connect.
* Bidders must refer to item #4.4 of the RFP for further information on using CPC Connect.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Important Notes:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Canada will not extend the RFP to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the Supply Arrangement and submit a proposal.

**Contact Information:**

For further information or to access the RFP, please contact the Procurement Specialist:

Shamael Malko-Moore
(343) 422-7228 (    )
shamael.malko-moore@pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**

This RFP is a part of the Department of National Defence's efforts to modernize its communication management and monitoring equipment.

Please note that the title has been rewritten to bring it to a more standard format. The text has been reformatted to make it easier to read. Redundant information has been removed to make it concise. References to "notice" and "tender" status have been removed, as they are extraneous and confusing.
